name: CEUUniversity
0:
”Alexa, ask c. e. u. what is the menu for today in cafeteria”
”Alexa, ask c. e. u. where is the library”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. e. u.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Skill for students and employees of CEU Universities. This skill provides information about schedules, tasks, locations, professor messages, university directory and phonebook etc.

This skill supports all alexa devices and has APL (Graphic content for screen Alexa devices).

First, you need to link your CEU Univeristy account to access the skill. Afterwards, the skill will guide you the first time you open it.

We are working in improving the skilll and adding new functionality periodically.

Enjoy the skill!
